item.title: Bibliographic research on the European influences in the modern urban music culture in the Balkans
item.description: A project, that started in 2020 and was implemented by the Institute of Balkan Studies & Centre of Thracology of the Bulgarian Academy of Sciences (IBSCT-BAS), titled “European influences in the modern urban music culture in the Balkans. Bibliographic research”, made an important step towards the further research and understanding of the social and cultural history, processes of modernization in Balkan societies and history of music. The main objective of this interdisciplinary project, funded by the Bulgarian National Science Fund (BNSF), was conducting a bibliographic study of European influences in the modern urban music culture in the Balkans.
